info.title: Operate an unchecked checkbox in reading mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToAndUncheckFirstCheckbox
setupScript.description: sets focus on the first checkbox and sets its state to unchecked

instructions.mode: Insure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.

assertions.expectation: Change in state (to partially checked) is conveyed
